: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus almost scrapped the mission right there and then. He was worried about Nightlight.
Rodimus Prime: Ok, just be careful, love. We'll try to make this quick.
Roddy looked to Blackfang.
Rodimus Prime: Well now that hell has broken lose, I say hit the Preds, and anyone else that fires at you.
Roddy looks over the cliff, and gets a lock on Perceptor. He shoots off three plasma shots...
 Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:Nightlight:

"Don't worry my  love... I'll be alright "said Nightlight with pain 
"Remember that your duties as leader are first... Listen, I'll cover myself 
and all will be fine..."


Nightlight dificultly moved, in that way that anybody beyond the cliff could 
see her, in a while she would be covered behind some rocks.






>From: "Nic <wingedwarrior41@...>" <wingedwarrior41@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: Roddy and Nightlight/Brothers
>Date: Thu, 13 Feb 2003 12:32:21 -0000
>
>Blackfang's optics widened as Devilcat ordered that all the intruders
>were to be taken down. That was not an ally the Maximals should have.
>
>Blackfang: HEY! What the heck is he doing?!?! Rodimus, who do we shoot on?
>
>His fingers were tense over the trigger of his shotgun and he kept
>track of Devilcat's head.
>
>Tyrael was up in the air and the few shots that came at him missed widely.
>
>Tyrael: Oh? Wasn't the area secure enough? Bloodthirsty stupid
>Rogues... Hitting Kaiser in one of his duel is not something you
>should do. Too bad you have to learn it the hard way.
>
>--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
><cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Devilcat/Rogues::
> >
> > Devilcat's form shimmers into being nearby.  "Greetings, friends.  I
> > thought I'd tag along, seeing as a number of my people are down
> > there."  He recloaks and makes his way down below to meet up with his
> > fellow Rogues.
> >
> > Decloaking again, he looks at Riekan.  "Well, what's the situation?"
> >
> > "This fellow says he'll join whatever faction proves to be the
> > strongest," the taller bot answers.  "They want to see us fight."
> >
> > "Then we'll fight," says Devilcat.  Turning, he indicates Tyreal,
> > Kaiser, and Starstorm - the three visible enemies.  "Forget the
> > normal routine.  Take them all down."
> >
> > All five bots open up with their respective weapons, blazing away
> > indiscriminately at anything that's Tripredacus or Predacon.
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>"
> > <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Nightlight:
> > >
> > > "i don't know"said with pain the girl, "I will move ovor here or
> > > both will be a perfect target"
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...>
> > > wrote:
> > > >
> > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > When Nightlight came next to him, Rodimus took his aim off of
> > > Perceptor and looked to his girlfriend. The pain she was in was now
> > > very apparent on her face.
> > > > Rodimus Prime(whisper): Nightlight, honey, what's the matter?
> > > >  "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" <airly2002@h...> wrote: nIGHTLIGHT::
> > > >
> > > > Nightlight moved nearest Rodimus, she felt that the pain was
> > > > increasing and she didn't know why. She didn't know if she can
> > > > resist more that pain.
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>"
> > > > <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Blackfang: Okay... We don't want the Preds to have a new bot in
> > > > their
> > > > > group, right? But what about the Tripreds? I know about Tyrael,
> > > and
> > > > > that other guy looks quite strong... I'd hate to be in
> > > Perceptor's
> > > > > shoes actually. You think they'd want to share the newcomers?
> > > > >
> > > > > He took hold of his energy shotgun and readied two blasts.
> > > > >
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > >
> > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > > Rodimus Prime: Thank you for your support. Both of you.
> > > > > > Rodimus could tell that Nightlight was struggling with
> > > something,
> > > > > she seemed to be in paid. He was about to say something whern
> > > they
> > > > > arrived at the cliff.
> > > > > > Rodimus Prime(whisper): Stay quiet, and low. We dont want to
> > be
> > > > > seen... yet. It's quite the party down there. It will be
> > > difficult
> > > > to
> > > > > extract the pod. Any ideas?
> > > > > > After speaking, Roddy transformes to bot mode, and draws his
> > > > blaster
> > > > > from subspace.
> > > > > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Blackfang: I think I see it... It looks like quite a
> > gathering...
> > > > > >
> > > > > > He arrived at the edge of a cliff and loked at the crashed
> > > ship
> > > > and
> > > > > > saw Tyrael, Perceptor, some Rogues and other bots he did not
> > > > know.
> > > > > > There was one who was down on the ground, but he had never
> > > seen
> > > > him
> > > > > > before.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>"
> > > > > > <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > > Nightlight:
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > "Count with me too"said Nightlight. She didn't know what
> > > it's
> > > > going
> > > > > > > on but now she was starting to feel pain but she tried to
> > > hold
> > > > back
> > > > > > > a moan. She tought that soon her upset would dissapear soon.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>"
> > > > > > > <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > > > Blackfang: Count me on your side. At least, he seems goal-
> > > > oriented
> > > > > > > for
> > > > > > > > now...
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen
> > > > <roborick007@y...>
> > > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > > > > > Rodimus had a good idea of what Blackfang was getting
> > > at.
> > > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: Yeah, Yggdrasil is the Commander of the
> > > > Iron
> > > > > > > Squad.
> > > > > > > > If you are thinking that they are not to be fully
> > trusted,
> > > > I'm
> > > > > > > ahead
> > > > > > > > of you. The Iron Squad have a reputation for being rather
> > > > ruthless
> > > > > > > in
> > > > > > > > millitary ways, and dont always live up to the principles
> > > of
> > > > other
> > > > > > > > Maximals and Autobots. I intend to keep a close eye on
> > > them.
> > > > I
> > > > > > > > wouldn't be surprised if Yggdrasil attempts to take
> > > command
> > > > from me
> > > > > > > > here. I wont let it happen though.
> > > > > > > > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > Blackfang felt like he had to ask.
> > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > Blackfang: That Yggdrasil... He is the Iron Squad
> > > > Commander,
> > > > > > > right?
> > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen
> > > > <roborick007@y...>
> > > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: Well Blackfang, we'll deal with them
> > > > > > > accordingly.
> > > > > > > > > Let's roll out!
> > > > > > > > > > Rodimus accelerates, pulling away from the base, at
> > > high
> > > > speed
> > > > > > > for
> > > > > > > > > their destination. He hadn't said anything, but
> > > Nightlight
> > > > > > > seemed a
> > > > > > > > > bit ill. He could just tell.
> > > > > > > > > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > > Blackfang transformed to wolf mode and ran up to
> > Rodimus.
> > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > Blackfang: It's likely we'll meet Tripreds... What
> > > will
> > > > we do
> > > > > > > about
> > > > > > > > > them?
> > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen
> > > > > > > <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime(via commlink): That's right. We are
> > > just
> > > > > > > outside the
> > > > > > > > > > base. Probably close to you.
> > > > > > > > > > > Sure enough, Rodimus soon saw Blackfang and walked
> > > up
> > > > to
> > > > > > > him.
> > > > > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: Ok, Let's get going.
> > > > > > > > > > > Roddy transformes to car mode.
> > > > > > > > > > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>"
> > <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > > > Blackfang responded.
> > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > Blackfang: I'm outside of the base. You and
> > > > Nightlight, you
> > > > > > > said?
> > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen
> > > > > > > <roborick007@y...>
> > > > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > > > > > > > > Rodimus recieved Yggdrasil's words over the comm.
> > > > > > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: Will do.
> > > > > > > > > > > > He looks to Nightlight.
> > > > > > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: So much for a peacefull walk.
> > Let's
> > > > both go
> > > > > > > help
> > > > > > > > > > > Blackfang on this mission. We can talk on the way.
> > > > > > > > > > > > Roddy then opens a comm to Blackfang.
> > > > > > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: This is Commander Prime. I have
> > > been
> > > > > > > informed
> > > > > > > > of your
> > > > > > > > > > > recovery mission. Nightlight and myself will assist
> > > > you.
> > > > > > > Whare
> > > > > > > > are you
> > > > > > > > > > > now?
> > > > > > > > > > > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>"
> > > <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > > > > Yggdrasil: Rodimus, there's a slight issue. There's
> > > a
> > > > ship
> > > > > > > that
> > > > > > > > landed
> > > > > > > > > > > > near the Rogues' base and I told them we'd send
> > > > > > > reinforcements
> > > > > > > > > so they
> > > > > > > > > > > > don't pull any tricks on us. Can you ask
> > > Nightlight
> > > > to go
> > > > > > > with
> > > > > > > > > > > Blackfang?
>
